extendedInfo.description: This software is not affiliated in any way with Activision or Black Ops 2.BO2 Randomizer is a handy utility to generate random classes for use in Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 Â®.This random class generator supports all weapons, perks, equipment and attachments. It also generates 3 random scorestreaks for every class that you can choose to use if you wish.Please consider purchasing the full version of the app as it helps support the developer while making updates and versions of the app for future games.Benefits over the free version: - No adverts (your one time payment supports the developer) - One click sharing to social media.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.davidhewitt.bo2classgenThis adds a new level of fun to BO2 because the generator creates classes that you otherwise wouldn't have thought of yourself. Sometimes, it adds an extra level of challenge to the game by giving you weapons with attachments that you don't normally see together.The generator creates you a class for BO2 based on your current player level and your current weapon levels. So it will only give you weapons and attachments that you have already unlocked.

reviews.title: Justin
reviews.comment: I love it it helps a lot but you can make this app more cooler putting headshot classes thnx alot
reviews.author: Justin Martinez

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This app is awesome! Would be even better if the random roll was broken down into subcategories like assault rifle, shotgun etc. Other then that very easy and simple to use!
reviews.author: Chris Seda

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Excellent randomizer, inclusion of scorestreaks is nice, I use it for custom games all the time.
reviews.author: Stephen Klein

reviews.title: Does exactly what it says
reviews.comment: If you are giving it a low rating because you get a bad class, remember that they are random. And if it is \"crashing\" you are probably lying becaude it works fine on my first gen android .... so there is no reason to rate under 5 stars.
reviews.author: Randy Urban

reviews.title: Plx
reviews.comment: It is a good app please add a full six man randomizer for clans Then this app would be top
reviews.author: Damon Gostomski

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Really fun app! It adds more fun into black ops 2 and give it more of a challenge. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Luke Kaittani

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: This app saves me so much time because I dont have to switch on the laptop this is a brilliant app good job

reviews.title: Weapon lvl not counted
reviews.comment: It tells you what attachments for weps without counting for what lvl you have them up to.

reviews.title: Well, I did ask for a random class
reviews.comment: Classes are completely random.  Shows score streaks (out of order) and wild cards too.  However I which you could tell it which items you unlocked early.

reviews.comment: I have got some combinations that u cant use like fastmag and extended clip please fix and add peacekeeper

reviews.comment: Im a youtuber giving people classes that I got a nukelear with, this app is perfect for that, thanks  :)

reviews.comment: This app has got me ranked up fast

reviews.comment: What is the roll thing?

reviews.title: GooooooooooD
reviews.comment: GooooooooooD
reviews.author: Luke Cooper

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app that makes the game much more fun. It will also help you improve on all gun types and help you to get out of your comfort zone with your custom classes. Good job making this with the \"pick 10\" system...I know it\'s much more difficult that way.
reviews.author: Jason Medeiros

reviews.title: Almost Perfect.
reviews.comment: This is a great app for random classes. It is almost perfect. It would be perfect if a feature was added where we could re-roll individual slots so you could ignore attachments and stuff you have not yet unlocked.  Another thing is when overkill is selected sometimes it doesn\'t have two weapons equipped. I understand with the pick 10 system it may be awkward to program this into the app, so I am going to give this app a 5 star rating.  P.S. - Thanks for the addition of the option for filling all 10 slots.
reviews.author: Michael J. McNamara

reviews.title: Sort of.
reviews.comment: It\'s kind of annoying that it thinks you have everything unlocked up to that level. Maybe you sould put something in to fix that such as gun level, wildcards you have, perks you have, equipment, guns, etc...
reviews.author: justin maxwell

reviews.title: reveiw
reviews.comment: i think i would be alot better if there were pictures i would look alot more prfessional but overall good app 4 stars
